lead_paragraph: Lost amid Darrelle Revis's holdout and Mark Sanchez's struggles, the Jets' special teams have been the team's lone consistent bright spot this summer, forcing at least one turnover in all three preseason games.
snippet: The Jets' special teams have been the team's lone consistent bright spot this summer, forcing at least one turnover in all three preseason games.

headline.main: Special Teams a Bright Spot for Jets

abstract: The Jets' special teams have been the team's lone consistent bright spot this summer, forcing at least one turnover in all three preseason games.
